author: Katie Canales
title: Police in California have started ticketing people having picnics and congregating in beach areas as law enforcement cracks down on violators of the statewide stay-at-home order
description: California authorities are beginning to issue tickets to people violating the statewide stay-at-home order designed to stunt the spread of the coronavirus disease. Citations have been given in San Francisco, Santa Cruz, and San Diego County, some to people fa…
content: When the San Francisco Bay Area and the state of California announced stay-at-home orders on March 17 and March 19, respectively, to contain the coronavirus disease, officials said that law enforcement would rely on voluntary compliance from residents instead… [+3607 chars]
